translations: [仪]仪器（instrument 的复数）；[机]工具；乐器
用器械装备；给乐器谱写（instrument 的三单形式）

sentences.sentence: All the instruments are working fine.
sentences.translation: 所有的仪器都运转良好。

sentences.sentence: Others were quietly tuning up their instruments.
sentences.translation: 其他人正安静地为他们的乐器调音。

sentences.sentence: The drum is one of the oldest musical instruments.
sentences.translation: 鼓是最古老的乐器之一。
